data.name: Rec Room
data.detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Online multiplayer so you can have fun with people from all over the world
  • Be yourself - customize your appearance in the changing room
  • Rec Room is cross platform so you can play with friends on Rift, Vive, PlayStation VR, Windows VR, etc
  • Hang out and play in the Rec Center, or The Park, or choose one of our fun activities:
    • Paintball
    • Co-op quests - challenging adventures designed to be played with your friends!
    • Laser Tag
    • Rec Royale
    • Dodgeball, Disc Golf, 3D Charades, and other fun casual minigames
  • Browse thousands of player-created game and event rooms for you to discover, with new ones added daily
  • Build rooms with your friends with easy and fun 3D creation tools
  • Robust mute, ignore and moderation tools help you manage your experience
  • A fantastic and growing community of players who will help you learn and have fun!


About the Game

Rec Room is the best place to hang out with friends from all around the world! Play intense multiplayer games like Paintball, Laser Tag, Quest, and Rec Royale, or just chill with friends in the park. There are thousands of player-created game and event rooms for you to discover, with new ones added daily. You can even build your own rooms with your friends. Rec Room is cross platform and free, so come and join the fun!

Things to Know

  • Rec Room is an active game. Please use common sense and caution while playing!
  • Rec Room is cross platform so you can play with friends on Rift, Vive, PlayStation VR, Windows VR, etc
  • Children between 13-18 must consult with a parent or guardian before playing.
  • In Early Access, Rec Room defaults to being a public experience. You will interact and voice chat with other people in real time. Rec Room offers mute, ignore, and reporting features which we encourage you to learn and use. But even if you use these features, you still may be exposed to speech or behavior you find inappropriate.
  • By playing Rec Room, you agree to our Code of Conduct: https://www.againstgrav.com/code-of-conduct
  • Please be aware of our in-game reporting tools: https://www.againstgrav.com/reporting

Discover thousands of player-created rooms, with new ones added daily. Or build your own rooms with friends. It's cross platform and free, so come and join the fun!
data.reviews:
“VR finally has its killer app, and it's called Rec Room”
C|Net

“A Killer Social VR Experience”
Giant Bomb

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
